preference.name: SUBSCMPL_CMD_TARGET_QUERY_NAMES
preference.preference_description: Specifies the display name and input attribute count in a saved query (delimited by a colon (:)) to be used to find a conflict mineral declaration (CMD) target object.

context.name: Teamcenter
context.value: Substance Compliance CMD - Get Target Object From Vendor Part:2
Substance Compliance CMD - Get Target Object From Vendor:1
